about_the_game:
The Neo Zodiac Has Arrived!

8 Conjurers with their 8 creature types battle for control of the Zodiac.
Defeat a Conjurer: their constellation and creatures are yours, plus hybrids of your own!
Your Zodiac of cards and creatures will continue to expand.
Aquarius the immortal waits at the center of the Zodiac.

Features

Innovative blend of Cards + Terrain Tactics:
  • Play cards on the map: creature cards on summoning circles, ability cards on creatures and spells on the terrain.
  • Terrain affects the power, movement and utility of all creatures.


Complete Zodiac of 60 Animated Creatures and Hybrids:
  • Humans, Prowlers, Hoofed beasts, Winged beasts, Lizards, Serpents, Polypods.
  • A Hoofed-Human is a Minotaur, an Polypod-Prowler is a Manticore, and a Winged-Lizard is a Dragon.


150 Cards and Deck Builder:
  • Choose weapon and spell cards that match your favorite creature's special abilities.
  • Prepare your deck to counter each opponent and contest their advantageous battlefield.


Challenging computer opponent; helpful tooltips and tutorial:
  • Lv.1 computer opponent attacks simply, Lv.3 uses spell combos and long-game advantages, Lv.5 thinks about every card and creature combination, and what order to use them in. You'll need luck-of-the-draw at this level!
  • Tutorial and help menu: learn the rules in around 10 minutes.
  • Three intense boss battles!
